__e: The Bible also tells us that God forgives his children. And we, as children of God, should forgive each other.
If you don't pretend to forgive everyone you hate, you never get invited anywhere.
# Will you forgive me for things I may have done?
I'll never forgive myself for not being there.
I know you're hurting because you weren't there with your son last night.
You're always saying that, but you don't ever forgive yourself.
And God forbid you forget her birthday.
Forgive the woman, for you would do the same if you'd her troubles.
